SINT_Prompt_Task.Objective: Assess quantum computing impact on current cybersecurity infrastructure using the SINT framework with Expert Debates (N=3) + Conflict (Step 3A) methodology, with detailed expert positions, numerical ratings (1-10), cross-criticism, and iterative convergence.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Context: The assessment must consider quantum algorithms threats, cryptographic vulnerabilities, and defense strategies. Experts: Quantum Physics Specialist, Cybersecurity Architect, Technology Policy Analyst. The process must include detailed expert positions with numerical ratings (1-10), cross-criticism, and iterative convergence with comprehensive synthesis.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Consultants: 1. Quantum Physics Specialist: Focuses on quantum computing capabilities and algorithmic threats. 2. Cybersecurity Architect: Evaluates current infrastructure vulnerabilities and defense mechanisms. 3. Technology Policy Analyst: Assesses regulatory implications and strategic responses.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Methodology: Expert Debates (N=3) + Conflict (Step 3A) with detailed expert positions, numerical ratings (1-10), cross-criticism, and iterative convergence.
SINT_Prompt_Task.Finalization_Protocol: - All expert positions must include detailed arguments with numerical ratings (1-10) and cross-evaluation scores. - The process must include multiple rounds of criticism and synthesis. - Output must include comprehensive analysis with specific examples and data points.
